answers.answer: I think it varies... I've heard women say their cutoff was 127.my cutoff was 140. I failed with a 148 lol.It may differ by the lab.
Mine was 140. I just did it today too and passed with a 132
Ah dang I got the 3 hour one tmrw morning n I forgot :/ I've been eating like a pig all day!
I had to fast for 12 hours before mine. The 3 hour one sucked for me. I was so nauseous and tired.  Hopefully it goes well for you. I'm still waiting for the results from my 3 hour test.
Ah really :/ good luck I hope you passed! With all the other worries n difficulties during pregnancy watching what you eat shouldn't be one lol
I have to do the glucose test on the 19th. it'll be the second time I've done it because the first time I only made it 30 minutes before getting sick. Bleh

Thank you. I hope I really passed too! They say pregnancy is the time to eat whatever you want. .lol. I don't wanna give up my pasta, chocolate or soda!That's what baby wants lol. I agree with you :)I hope you pass yours too!

I just took my test on the 11th and I'm trying to be patient to see if I passed it or not. My baby's father has diabetes and told me that my reaction to it wasn't like how his is with sugar. So I'm hoping he's right and I pass it. I'm hoping to find out if I passed at my next appointment or hopefully before it.
Mine was 140, I failed by 10 points. Luckily I get to take the one hour one again instead of taking the three hour one.

What if it's too low...I mean is there also a low end where your sugar levels are not high enough. I haveblackouts and during these I sweat...but yesterday, i ate sweet stuff pretty much all day and I felt great, is it possible I have low blood sugar levels?
That's possible. .. just talk to your doctor.
My number I couldn't go over was 127
Aww :( I hope you all have happy healthy pregnancies and babies n that none of our sugar levels get too high so we can still eat what we crave lol

question: Does anybody know the cut off number that they consider you to have gestational diabetes
title: glucose test
